name: Vegan Whole Wheat Blueberry Pancakes
description: The pancakes are super easy to make and you can adapt them in a million different ways. I use this same recipe to make carrot cake pancakes or chocolate chip ones.

recipeInstructions.text: Sift flour, baking powder, sugar and salt into a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Sift flour, baking powder, sugar and salt into a large bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl combine the almond milk, ground flaxseed, and vinegar. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl combine the almond milk, ground flaxseed, and vinegar. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add water, vanilla extract, and canola oil to the almond milk mixture. Whisk to incorporate.
recipeInstructions.name: Add water, vanilla extract, and canola oil to the almond milk mixture. Whisk to incorporate.

recipeInstructions.text: Make a well in the center of the flour bowl and add liquid mixture. Whisk until a lumpy batter forms.
recipeInstructions.name: Make a well in the center of the flour bowl and add liquid mixture. Whisk until a lumpy batter forms.

recipeInstructions.text: To cook pancakes, heat a skillet to medium-low heat and grease lightly. Pour batter onto pan and place 6 – 7 frozen blueberries on the pancake batter. Let cook for about 4 min. or until fluffy and golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: To cook pancakes, heat a skillet to medium-low heat and grease lightly. Pour batter onto pan and place 6 – 7 frozen blueberries on the pancake batter. Let cook for about 4 min. or until fluffy and golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Flip and cook pancake on other side for 3 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Flip and cook pancake on other side for 3 more minutes.

keywords: blueberry pancakes, vegan pancakes, whole wheat pancake
